gc_terms.f90

00001 module gc_terms
00002     implicit none
00003     save
00004     real, allocatable :: bCurvature_R(:,:), 
00005         bCurvature_phi(:,:), bCurvature_z(:,:), 
00006         bGradient_R(:,:), bGradient_phi(:,:), 
00007         bGradient_z(:,:), bDotGradB(:,:)
00008 
00009 contains
00010     subroutine bCurvature ()
00011         use eqdsk 
00012         use dlg
00013         use constants
00014         implicit none
00015        
00016         integer :: j
00017         real, dimension(nw,nh) :: bR_B, bPhi_B, bz_B, 
00018             bDotGradB_R, bDotGradB_phi, bDotGradB_z, 
00019             bR_B_dR, bR_B_dz, bPhi_B_dR, bPhi_B_dz, 
00020             bz_B_dR, bz_B_dz, r2D, omega, 
00021             gradB_R, gradB_z
00022 
00023         do j=1,nh
00024             r2D(:,j)    = r
00025         end do
00026 
00027         omega   = q * bMag / mi
00028 
00029         bR_B    = bR / bMag
00030         bPhi_B  = bPhi / bMag
00031         bz_B    = bz / bMag 
00032 
00033         bR_B_dR = dlg_pDeriv ( bR_B, 1, rStep )
00034         bR_B_dz = dlg_pDeriv ( bR_B, 2, zStep )
00035         
00036         bPhi_B_dR   = dlg_pDeriv ( bPhi_B, 1, rStep )
00037         bPhi_B_dz   = dlg_pDeriv ( bPhi_B, 2, zStep )
00038  
00039         bz_B_dR = dlg_pDeriv ( bz_B, 1, rStep )
00040         bz_B_dz = dlg_pDeriv ( bz_B, 2, zStep )
00041     
00042         bDotGradB_R = bR_B * bR_B_dR + bz_B * bR_B_dz - bPhi_B**2 / r2D
00043         bDotGradB_phi   = bPhi_B * bR_B / r2D + bR_B * bPhi_B_dR &
00044             + bz_B * bPhi_B_dz
00045         bDotGradB_z = bR_B * bz_B_dR + bz_B * bz_B_dz
00046 
00047         allocate ( bCurvature_R(nw,nh), bCurvature_phi(nw,nh), bCurvature_z(nw,nh) )
00048 
00049         bCurvature_R = ( bPhi_B * bDotGradB_z - bz_B * bDotGradB_phi ) / omega
00050         bCurvature_phi   = -1.0 * ( bR_B * bDotGradB_z - bz_B * bDotGradB_R ) &
00051             / omega
00052         bCurvature_z = ( bR_B * bDotGradB_phi - bPhi_B * bDotGradB_R ) / omega
00053 
00054         ! Also in here is the b.Grad b for calculating vPar
00055 
00056         gradB_R = dlg_pDeriv ( bMag, 1, rStep )
00057         gradB_z = dlg_pDeriv ( bMag, 2, zStep )
00058 
00059         allocate ( bDotGradB(nw,nh) )
00060 
00061         bDotGradB   = bR_B * gradB_R + bz_B * gradB_z
00062        
00063     end subroutine bCurvature
00064 
00065     subroutine bGradient ()
00066         use eqdsk
00067         use dlg
00068         use constants
00069         !use dislin
00070         implicit none
00071         real, dimension(nw,nh) :: bR_B, bPhi_B, bz_B, 
00072             lnB_dR, lnB_dz, lnB, omega
00073 
00074         !!   Plot variables
00075         !
00076         !integer :: nLevs, i
00077         !real, allocatable :: levels(:)
00078         !real :: levStep
00079 
00080         omega   = q * bMag / mi
00081         lnB = log ( bMag )
00082         lnB_dR  = dlg_pDeriv ( lnB, 1, rStep )
00083         lnB_dz  = dlg_pDeriv ( lnB, 2, zStep )
00084 
00085         bR_B    = bR / bMag
00086         bPhi_B  = bPhi / bMag
00087         bz_B    = bz / bMag 
00088 
00089         allocate ( bGradient_R(nw,nh), bGradient_phi(nw,nh), &
00090             bGradient_z(nw,nh) )
00091 
00092         bGradient_R = bPhi_B * lnB_dz / ( 2.0 * omega )
00093         bGradient_phi   = -1.0 * ( bR_B * lnB_dz - bz_B * lnB_dR ) &
00094             / ( 2.0 * omega )
00095         bGradient_z = -1.0 * bPhi_B * lnB_dR / ( 2.0 * omega ) 
00096 
00097         !!call setFil ( 'eqdsk.eps' ) 
00098         !!call setPag ( 'DA4P' )
00099         !call scrMod ( 'REVERS' )
00100         !call metaFl ( 'XWIN' )
00101         !call disIni ()
00102         !call graf ( 0.0, 3.0, 0.0, 0.5, -2.0, 2.0, -2.0, 0.5 ) 
00103         !call noClip ()
00104         !call color ('BLUE')         
00105         !
00106         !nLevs   = 101 
00107         !levStep    = maxVal ( abs ( bz ) ) / ( nLevs / 2 )
00108         !allocate ( levels(nLevs) )
00109         !levels = (/ (i*levStep,i=-nLevs/2,nLevs/2) /)
00110         !write (*,*) levels
00111         !do i=0,nLevs-1
00112         !    call contur ( r, nw, z, nh, bz, levels(i) ) 
00113         !end do
00114         !call endGrf ()
00115         !read (*,*) 
00116 
00117     end subroutine bGradient
00118 
00119 end module gc_terms
